title: Chapter 1850 - An Assistant!
body:
Chapter 1850 - An Assistant!

The Ninebend Divine River Chains descended.

Su Yi exerted his will, then struck with his palm.

Bang!

The fiery red chain shook, then froze in midair.

Su Yi seized the opportunity to circulate the Tree of All World’s power and disappear.

A moment later, he reappeared ten thousand feet away, his blood and qi churning. He couldn’t help but look startled.

She used her Great Profound cultivation right from the get-go!

“You… actually blocked it?” Qing Wu was stunned, and she found this difficult to believe. She’d been preparing for this strike for a long time, she’d used the full extent of her Great Profound cultivation base without hesitation, and she’d ambushed him. That should have been enough to severely injure even others of the same level.

She’d thought her victory was certain against an Immortal King like Su Yi. Yet he’d somehow slipped through her fingers.

“It seems this was just a meticulously prepared deathtrap,” Su Yi said calmly. “Alas, I knew right from the start that a capricious woman like you was unworthy of my trust.”

Qing Wu grinned. “And what good does knowing that do you? You’ve already fallen into my trap. There’s no escape...
